entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
